title: Software Requirements and Security Considerations
description: Software requirements gathering. Critical systems requirements gathering. Security requirements. Traceability of requirements. Verification, validation, and documentation techniques. Software requirements quality attributes. Security policies. Measures for data confidentiality. Design principles that enhance security. Access control mechanisms.
antirequisites: Antirequisite(s): SFWRENG 3RA3  Not open to students in a Software Engineering or Mechatronics Engineering program.
schedule: Three lectures, one tutorial (one hour); one term
courseText: COMPSCI 3RA3 - Software Requirements and Security Considerations 3 unit(s)

Software requirements gathering. Critical systems requirements gathering. Security requirements. Traceability of requirements. Verification, validation, and documentation techniques. Software requirements quality attributes. Security policies. Measures for data confidentiality. Design principles that enhance security. Access control mechanisms.
Three lectures, one tutorial (one hour); one term
Antirequisite(s): SFWRENG 3RA3  Not open to students in a Software Engineering or Mechatronics Engineering program.
